title: Do you know the date the legal separation took place?
question: Do you know the date the legal separation took place?
paragraph1: You can find the date in the legal separation document.
paragraph2: If you do not have this, you can get an official copy of the legal separation document (opens in a new tab).
optionNo: No, I do not know the date
